summary: The 2026 Winter Olympics, called Milano Cortina 2026, will be held in Milan and Cortina d'Ampezzo, Italy, from February 6 to 22. This is the fourth Olympics Italy has hosted. It's the first Olympics with multiple host cities and the first Winter Olympics since 1984 with different venues for opening and closing ceremonies. Events will also happen in seven other Italian cities. Italy won the bid to host, beating Sweden. These games mark several anniversaries and the first Olympics in Milan.
title: 2026 Winter Olympics
